title: On the proper inclusion property of (discrete) Morrey spaces
authors: Yohanes I. Runtunuwu, Janny Lindiarni, and Hendra Gunawan
abstract:
In this paper, we construct a function which confirms the proper inclusion
property of Morrey spaces, by using a relation between a class of functions in
Morrey spaces and discrete Morrey spaces. Our particular function is simpler
than those constructed by Gunawan \textit{et al.} in \cite{gunawan1, gunawan2}.
